design_philosophy.core_concept: High-tech underground cannabis cultivation on the blockchain.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode Neon, Glassmorphism, Industrial Sci-Fi
principles: No Stoner Clich√©s: Avoid rasta colors or messy grunge. Think 'High-Tech Lab' not 'Basement'.
Neon is Function: Use glow to signal interactivity and rarity.
Depth over Flatness: Use layered glass and shadows to create a 3D feel on 2D screens.
Gold for Glory: VIP and High-value items must feel physically heavy and golden.

layout_strategies.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-black relative overflow-hidden

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(57,255,20,0.6)] transition-all active:scale-95 clip-path-polygon-[10px_0,100%_0,100%_calc(100%-10px),calc(100%-10px)_100%,0_100%,0_10px]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/30 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.action: bg-gradient-to-r from-green-600 to-green-500 text-white font-bold shadow-lg hover:brightness-110

cards.plot: relative aspect-square bg-white/5 rounded-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden group
cards.item: flex flex-col gap-2 p-3 bg-white/5 rounded-lg border border-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-20 bg-black/90 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/10 flex justify-around items-center z-50 pb-4 max-w-md mx-auto

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds, only for text or subtle overlays.
Ensure 44px min touch target for all mobile interactions.
Do not use default scrollbars; hide them or style them thin/dark.
All prices and balances must be formatted with thousand separators.
